name: ASL Aviation Holdings
goal: ASL Aviation Holdings, formerly ASL Aviation Group currently has operations over 7 continents and has 2500 staff from 51 nationalities in 20 countries. A global leader in providing ACMI services to the express freight integrators and postal industries, ASL aslo operates passenger flights on ACMI basis and under its own brand. The group has 6 airlines in Europe and and both passenger and cargo arilines in in South Africa and Asia.
euInitiatives: External Aviation Policy through EU Consultative Forums DG MOVE. Aviation comprehensive agreement with third countries.
